A01.name: Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities
A01.includes: Growing of non-perennial crops; Growing of perennial crops; Plant propagation; Animal production; Mixed farming; Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities; Hunting, trapping and related service activities

A02.name: Forestry and logging
A02.includes: Silviculture and other forestry activities; Logging; Gathering of non-wood forest products; Support services to forestry

A03.name: Fishing and aquaculture
A03.includes: Fishing; Aquaculture; Support activities for fishing and aquaculture

B05.name: Mining of coal and lignite
B05.includes: Mining of hard coal; Mining of lignite

B06.name: Extraction of crude petroleum and natural gas
B06.includes: Extraction of crude petroleum; Extraction of natural gas

B07.name: Mining of metal ores
B07.includes: Mining of iron ores; Mining of non-ferrous metal ores

B08.name: Other mining and quarrying
B08.includes: Quarrying of stone, sand and clay; Mining and quarrying n.e.c.

B09.name: Mining support service activities
B09.includes: Support activities for petroleum and natural gas extraction; Support activities for other mining and quarrying

C10.name: Manufacture of food products
C10.includes: Processing and preserving of meat; Processing and preserving of fish, crustaceans and molluscs; Processing and preserving of fruit and vegetables; Manufacture of vegetable and animal oils and fats; Manufacture of dairy products; Manufacture of grain mill products, starches and starch products; Manufacture of other food products; Manufacture of prepared animal feeds

C13.name: Manufacture of textiles
C13.includes: Spinning, weaving and finishing of textiles; Manufacture of other textiles

C14.name: Manufacture of wearing apparel
C14.includes: Manufacture of wearing apparel, except fur apparel; Manufacture of articles of fur; Manufacture of knitted and crocheted apparel

C15.name: Manufacture of leather and related products
C15.includes: Tanning, dyeing, dressing of leather and fur; manufacture of luggage, handbags, saddlery and harness; Manufacture of footwear

C16.name: Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials
C16.includes: Sawmilling and planing of wood; Manufacture of products of wood, cork, straw and plaiting materials

C17.name: Manufacture of paper and paper products
C17.includes: Manufacture of paper and paper products

C18.name: Printing and reproduction of recorded media
C18.includes: Printing and service activities related to printing; Reproduction of recorded media

C19.name: Manufacture of coke and refined petroleum products
C19.includes: Manufacture of coke oven products; Manufacture of refined petroleum products; manufacture of fossil fuel products

C20.name: Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products
C20.includes: Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics and synthetic rubber in primary forms; Manufacture of other chemical products; Manufacture of man-made fibres

C21.name: Manufacture of basic pharmaceutical products and pharmaceutical preparations
C21.includes: Manufacture of pharmaceuticals, medicinal chemical and botanical products

C22.name: Manufacture of rubber and plastic products
C22.includes: Manufacture of rubber products; Manufacture of plastics products

C23.name: Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products
C23.includes: Manufacture of glass and glass products; Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c.

C24.name: Manufacture of basic metals
C24.includes: Manufacture of basic iron and steel; Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals; Casting of metals

C25.name: Manufacture of fabricated metal products, except machinery and equipment
C25.includes: Manufacture of structural metal products, tanks, reservoirs and steam generators; Manufacture of weapons and ammunition; Manufacture of other fabricated metal products; metalworking service activities

C26.name: Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products
C26.includes: Manufacture of electronic components and boards; Manufacture of computers and peripheral equipment; Manufacture of communication equipment; Manufacture of consumer electronics; Manufacture of measuring, testing, navigating and control equipment; watches and clocks; Manufacture of irradiation, electromedical and electrotherapeutic equipment; Manufacture of optical instruments and photographic equipment; Manufacture of magnetic and optical media

C27.name: Manufacture of electrical equipment
C27.includes: Manufacture of electric motors, generators, transformers and electricity distribution and control apparatus; Manufacture of batteries and accumulators; Manufacture of wiring and wiring devices; Manufacture of lighting equipment; Manufacture of domestic appliances; Manufacture of other electrical equipment

C28.name: Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c.
C28.includes: Manufacture of general-purpose machinery; Manufacture of special-purpose machinery

C29.name: Manufacture of motor vehicles, trailers and semi-trailers
C29.includes: Manufacture of motor vehicles; Manufacture of bodies (coachwork) for motor vehicles; manufacture of trailers and semi-trailers; Manufacture of parts and accessories for motor vehicles

C30.name: Manufacture of other transport equipment
C30.includes: Building of ships and boats; Manufacture of railway locomotives and rolling stock; Manufacture of air and spacecraft and related machinery; Manufacture of military fighting vehicles; Manufacture of transport equipment n.e.c.

C32.name: Other manufacturing
C32.includes: Manufacture of jewellery, bijouterie and related articles; Manufacture of musical instruments; Manufacture of sports goods; Manufacture of games and toys; Manufacture of medical and dental instruments and supplies; Other manufacturing n.e.c.

C33.name: Repair, maintenance and installation of machinery and equipment
C33.includes: Repair and maintenance of fabricated metal products, machinery and equipment; Installation of industrial machinery and equipment

D.name: Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply

D35.name: Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply
D35.includes: Electric power generation, transmission and distribution activities; Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains; Steam and air conditioning supply; Activities of brokers and agents for electric power and natural gas

E.name: Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities

E38.name: Waste collection, treatment and disposal, and recovery activities
E38.includes: Waste collection activities; Waste treatment and disposal; Materials and other waste recovery

E39.name: Remediation and other waste management service activities
E39.includes: Remediation and other waste management service activities

F41.name: Construction of residential and non-residential buildings
F41.includes: Construction of residential and non-residential buildings

F42.name: Civil engineering
F42.includes: Construction of roads and railways; Construction of utility projects; Construction of other civil engineering projects

F43.name: Specialized construction activities
F43.includes: Demolition and site preparation; Electrical, plumbing and other construction installation activities; Building completion and finishing; Intermediation service activities for specialized construction services; Other specialized construction activities

G46.name: Wholesale trade
G46.includes: Wholesale on a fee or contract basis; Wholesale of agricultural raw materials and live animals; Wholesale of food, beverages and tobacco; Wholesale of household goods; Wholesale of machinery, equipment and supplies; Wholesale of motor vehicles, motorcycles and related parts and accessories; Other specialized wholesale; Non-specialized wholesale trade

G47.name: Retail trade
G47.includes: Non-specialized retail sale; Retail sale of food, beverages and tobacco; Retail sale of automotive fuel; Retail sale of information and communication equipment; Retail sale of other household equipment; Retail sale of cultural and recreational goods; Retail sale of other goods, except motor vehicles and motorcycles; Retail sale of motor vehicles, motorcycles and related parts and accessories; Intermediation service activities for retail sale

H49.name: Land transport and transport via pipelines
H49.includes: Transport via railways; Other land transport; Transport via pipeline

H50.name: Water transport
H50.includes: Sea and coastal water transport; Inland water transport

H51.name: Air transport
H51.includes: Passenger air transport; Freight air transport

H52.name: Warehousing and support activities for transportation
H52.includes: Warehousing and storage; Support activities for transportation; Intermediation service activities for transportation

H53.name: Postal and courier activities
H53.includes: Postal activities; Courier activities; Intermediation service activities for postal and courier activities

I55.name: Accommodation
I55.includes: Hotels and similar accommodation activities; Other short term accommodation activities; Camping grounds, recreational vehicle parks and trailer parks; Intermediation service activities for accommodation; Other accommodation n.e.c.

I56.name: Food and beverage service activities
I56.includes: Restaurants and mobile food service activities; Event catering and other food service activities; Beverage serving activities; Intermediation service activities for food and beverage services activities

J.name: Publishing, broadcasting, and content production and distribution activities

J58.name: Publishing activities
J58.includes: Publishing of books, newspapers, periodicals and other publishing activities; Software publishing

J59.name: Motion picture, video and television programme production, sound recording and music publishing activities
J59.includes: Motion picture, video and television programme activities; Sound recording and music publishing activities

J60.name: Programming, broadcasting, news agency and other content distribution activities
J60.includes: Radio broadcasting and audio distribution activities; Television programming, broadcasting and video distribution activities; News agency and other content distribution activities

K.name: Telecommunications, computer programming, consultancy, computing infrastructure, and other information service activities

K61.name: Telecommunications
K61.includes: Wired, wireless, and satellite telecommunication activities; Telecommunication reselling activities and intermediation service activities for telecommunication; Other telecommunication activities

K62.name: Computer programming, consultancy and related activities
K62.includes: Computer programming activities; Computer consultancy and computer facilities management activities; Other information technology and computer service activities

K63.name: Computing infrastructure, data processing, hosting, and other information service activities
K63.includes: Computing infrastructure, data processing, hosting and related activities; Web search portals activities and other information service activities

L64.name: Financial service activities, except insurance and pension funding
L64.includes: Monetary intermediation; Activities of holding companies and financing conduits; Activities of trusts, funds and similar financial entities; Other financial service activities, except insurance and pension funding activities

L65.name: Insurance, reinsurance and pension funding, except compulsory social security

L66.name: Activities auxiliary to financial service and insurance activities
L66.includes: Activities auxiliary to financial services, except insurance and pension funding; Activities auxiliary to insurance and pension funding; Fund management activities

M68.name: Real estate activities
M68.includes: Real estate activities with own or leased property; Real estate activities on a fee or contract basis

N69.name: Legal and accounting activities
N69.includes: Legal activities; Accounting, bookkeeping and auditing activities; tax consultancy

N70.name: Activities of head offices; management consultancy activities
N70.includes: Activities of head offices; Business and other management consultancy activities

N71.name: Architectural and engineering activities; technical testing and analysis
N71.includes: Architectural and engineering, and related technical consultancy activities; Technical testing and analysis

N72.name: Scientific research and development
N72.includes: Research and experimental development on natural sciences and engineering; Research and experimental development on social sciences and humanities

N73.name: Activities of advertising, market research and public relations
N73.includes: Advertising activities; Market research and public opinion polling activities; Public relations activities

N74.name: Other professional, scientific and technical activities
N74.includes: Specialized design activities; Photographic activities; Translation and interpretation activities; Other professional, scientific and technical activities n.e.c.

O77.name: Rental and leasing activities
O77.includes: Rental and leasing of motor vehicles; Rental and leasing of personal and household goods; Rental and leasing of other machinery, equipment and tangible goods; Leasing of intellectual property and similar products, except copyrighted works; Intermediation service activities for rental and leasing of tangible goods and non-financial intangible assets

O78.name: Employment activities
O78.includes: Activities of employment placement agencies; Temporary employment agency activities and other human resource provisions

O79.name: Travel agency, tour operator, and other travel related activities
O79.includes: Travel agency and tour operator activities; Other travel related activities

O81.name: Services to buildings and landscape activities
O81.includes: Combined facilities support activities; Cleaning activities; Landscape service activities

O82.name: Office administrative, office support and other business support activities
O82.includes: Office administrative and support activities; Activities of call centres; Organization of conventions and trade shows; Intermediation service activities for business support activities n.e.c., except financial intermediation; Business support service activities n.e.c.

P.name: Public administration and defence; compulsory social security

P84.name: Public administration and defence; compulsory social security
P84.includes: Administration of the State and the economic, social and environmental policies of the community; Provision of services to the community as a whole; Compulsory social security activities

Q85.name: Education
Q85.includes: Pre-primary education; Primary education; Secondary and post-secondary non-tertiary education; Tertiary education; Other education; Educational support activities

R.name: Human health and social work activities

R86.name: Human health activities
R86.includes: Hospital activities; Medical and dental practice activities; Other human health activities

R87.name: Residential care activities
R87.includes: Residential nursing care activities; Residential care activities for persons living with or having a diagnosis of a mental illness or substance abuse; Residential care activities for older persons or persons with physical disabilities; Other residential care activities

R88.name: Social work activities without accommodation
R88.includes: Social work activities without accommodation for older persons or persons with disabilities; Other social work activities without accommodation

S90.name: Arts creation and performing arts activities
S90.includes: Arts creation activities; Activities of performing arts; Support activities to arts creation and performing arts

S91.name: Library, archives, museum and other cultural activities
S91.includes: Library and archive activities; Museum, collection, historical site and monument activities; Conservation, restoration and other support activities for cultural heritage; Botanical and zoological garden and nature reserve activities

S93.name: Sports activities and amusement and recreation activities
S93.includes: Sports activities; Amusement and recreation activities

T94.name: Activities of membership organizations
T94.includes: Activities of business, employers and professional membership organizations; Activities of trade unions; Activities of other membership organizations

T95.name: Repair and maintenance of computers, personal and household goods, and motor vehicles and motorcycles
T95.includes: Repair and maintenance of computers and communication equipment; Repair and maintenance of personal and household goods; Repair and maintenance of motor vehicles and motorcycles; Intermediation service activities for repair and maintenance of computers, personal and household goods, and motor vehicles and motorcycles

T96.name: Personal service activities
T96.includes: Washing and cleaning of textile and fur products; Hairdressing, beauty treatment, day spa and similar activities; Funeral and related activities; Intermediation service activities for personal services; Other personal service activities n.e.c.

U.name: Activities of households as employers; undifferentiated goods- and services-producing activities of households for own use

U97.name: Activities of households as employers of domestic personnel
U97.includes: Activities of households as employers of domestic personnel

U98.name: Undifferentiated goods- and services-producing activities of private households for own use
U98.includes: Undifferentiated goods-producing activities of private households for own use; Undifferentiated service-producing activities of private households for own use

V99.includes: Activities of extraterritorial organizations and bodies
